entry.name: jQuery.isArray
entry.title: jQuery.isArray()

argument.name: obj
argument.desc: Object to test whether or not it is an array.

entry.desc: Determine whether the argument is an array.

longdesc.p: $.isArray() returns a Boolean indicating whether the object is a JavaScript array (not an array-like object, such as a jQuery object).

example.desc: Finds out if the parameter is an array.
